function bitmask = getbitmask(bitlevel)
bitmask=fi(0,1,32,28);
switch(bitlevel)
    case 0
        bitmask = fi(0.0000000000000000000000000000,1,32,28);
    case 1
        bitmask = fi(-8.0000000000000000000000000000,1,32,28);
    case 2
        bitmask = fi(-4.0000000000000000000000000000,1,32,28);
    case 3
        bitmask = fi(-2.0000000000000000000000000000,1,32,28);
    case 4
        bitmask = fi(-1.0000000000000000000000000000,1,32,28);
    case 5
        bitmask = fi(-0.5000000000000000000000000000,1,32,28);
    case 6
        bitmask = fi(-0.2500000000000000000000000000,1,32,28);
    case 7
        bitmask = fi(-0.1250000000000000000000000000,1,32,28);
    case 8
        bitmask = fi(-0.0625000000000000000000000000,1,32,28);
    case 9
        bitmask = fi(-0.0312500000000000000000000000,1,32,28);
    case 10
        bitmask = fi(-0.0156250000000000000000000000,1,32,28);
    case 11
        bitmask = fi(-0.0078125000000000000000000000,1,32,28);
    case 12
        bitmask = fi(-0.0039062500000000000000000000,1,32,28);
    case 13
        bitmask = fi(-0.0019531250000000000000000000,1,32,28);
    case 14
        bitmask = fi(-0.0009765625000000000000000000,1,32,28);
    case 15
        bitmask = fi(-0.0004882812500000000000000000,1,32,28);
    case 16
        bitmask = fi(-0.0002441406250000000000000000,1,32,28);
    case 17
        bitmask = fi(-0.0001220703125000000000000000,1,32,28);
    case 18
        bitmask = fi(-0.0000610351562500000000000000,1,32,28);
    case 19
        bitmask = fi(-0.0000305175781250000000000000,1,32,28);
    case 20
        bitmask = fi(-0.0000152587890625000000000000,1,32,28);
    case 21
        bitmask = fi(-0.0000076293945312500000000000,1,32,28);
    case 22
        bitmask = fi(-0.0000038146972656250000000000,1,32,28);
    case 23
        bitmask = fi(-0.0000019073486328125000000000,1,32,28);
    case 24
        bitmask = fi(-0.0000009536743164062500000000,1,32,28);
    case 25
        bitmask = fi(-0.0000004768371582031250000000,1,32,28);
    case 26
        bitmask = fi(-0.0000002384185791015625000000,1,32,28);
    case 27
        bitmask = fi(-0.0000001192092895507812500000,1,32,28);
    case 28
        bitmask = fi(-0.0000000596046447753906250000,1,32,28);
    case 29
        bitmask = fi(-0.0000000298023223876953125000,1,32,28);
    case 30
        bitmask = fi(-0.0000000149011611938476562500,1,32,28);
    case 31
        bitmask = fi(-0.0000000074505805969238281250,1,32,28);
    case 32
        bitmask = fi(-0.0000000037252902984619140625,1,32,28);
end
